metadata.title: Ruifan 2mm 2.5mm 3mm CZ Internally Threaded Labret Monroe Lip Ring Tragus Nail Helix Earring Stud Piercing Jewelry 16G 6mm 3PCS
features: There have different COLORS available, please choose suitable one for you.
Product Materials: 316L Surgical Steel + High Quality Cubic Zircon
Package Includes: 3 x CZ Stainless Steel Lip Rings, come with one free gift velvet bag.
description: Material is constructed of high quality Surgical grade Stainless Steel. Simply insert the opening of the hoop through the nostril. Twist and turn through piercing until the flat disc on the end is resting against the inner part of the nostril. 316L Surgical Grade Stainless Steel.   *Due to the camera and the computer screen showing,the color will be a little different.Please kindly understand.
